casebody.data:
S.B.K. (Formerly R.B.), an Infant by His Guardian Ad Litem, Barbara Klein, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
HARVEST OF HOPE, Defendant-Petitioner,
and
The State of New Jersey Division of Youth and Family Services ("DYFS"), et al., Defendants. C-417 September Term 2018
081834 Supreme Court of New Jersey. December 17, 2018

ORDER

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-003060-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
